title: Peak online shopping hours of U.S. consumers 2015
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of respondents. In total the number of data points it has is 4.
In general Share of respondents has fallen over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly decreasing from 11_AM_-_4_PM to 7-11_AM, and finally slightly increasing from 7-11_AM to 9_PM_-_2_AM.
The line rapidly increased by 71.43% from Year 11_AM_-_4_PM to 4-9_PM, and lastly, decreased by 79.17% from Year 4-9_PM to 7-11_AM.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 4-9_PM and 7-11_AM.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 48.0 was reported at Year 4-9_PM
Minimum Share of respondents about 10.0 was reached at Year 7-11_AM
